Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Nakhtheneb born of Tasherettaihet with a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with a plaited beard, crossed hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder, the leg section is inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in nine rows of incised Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
